{# errorcheck #} // ERROR `syntax error: using not allowed in tag` // ERROR `syntax error: using not allowed in quoted attribute` // ERROR `syntax error: using not allowed in unquoted attribute` {% show this; using []string %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected [, expecting identifier, macro or %}` {% show this; using int %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected int, expecting string, html, css, js, json, markdown or macro` {% var foo string %} {% show this; using foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting string, html, css, js, json, markdown or macro` {% show this; foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using` {% show this; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% show; using %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting expression` {% show using int %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected int, expecting string, html, css, js, json or markdown` {% show using macro %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected macro, expecting identifier or %}` {% show using; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% a := this; foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using` {% a += this; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% i++; using %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% f(this); foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using` {% f(this); %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% c <- this; foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using` {% c <- this; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% var a = this; foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using` {% var a = this; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}`
